TEXT.TITLE: <FINANCIAL TRUSTCO CAPITAL LTD> HIKES PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Qtly div 12.5 cts vs six cts Pay March 31 Record March 24 Note: Co also declares 12.5 ct qtly div on special shares issued in December, 1986, with same pay and record dates. Reuter
